context: Sprinklr provides a unified customer experience management platform covering social media, customer care, marketing, and research. The AI-powered platform helps enterprises manage customer interactions at scale.

competitors.name: Salesforce Marketing Cloud
competitors.notes: Enterprise marketing automation with social and customer service capabilities

competitors.name: Sprout Social
competitors.notes: Social media management and analytics platform

competitors.name: Hootsuite
competitors.notes: Social media management platform for enterprises and agencies

competitors.name: Khoros (Spredfast + Lithium)
competitors.notes: Social media and community management platform

competitors.name: Qualtrics
competitors.notes: Experience management competing in customer and brand research

competitors.name: Medallia
competitors.notes: Customer and employee experience platform with feedback management

competitors.name: NICE CXone
competitors.notes: Contact center platform competing in customer care

competitors.name: Emplifi (Socialbakers)
competitors.notes: Social media marketing and commerce platform
